qti-item-body.p: Crows play an important part of the ecosystem in Corvusville, Pennsylvania.
Play this short video where a Park Ranger discusses some of the important contributions that crows make to the local ecosystem.

Based on what you learned from the Ranger in the video, how do you think some kind of wild animal plays an important part of your local environment? Use examples to support your ideas. Write at least 50 words about your animal.
